snippet: The plan of one state, Washington, to save its shellfish from the ravages of ocean acidification.
abstract: Editorial welcomes Washington State plan to address ocean acidification brought on by carbon emissions, which could provide valuable lessons for protecting oceans and seas in other parts of world.
lead_paragraph: The plan of one state, Washington, to save its shellfish from the ravages of ocean acidification.

headline.main: Marine Life on a Warming Planet
headline.print_headline: Marine Life on a Warming Planet
